trans-unit.source: Defines a particular format for text, including font face, size, and style attributes.
trans-unit.target: 定义特定文本，包括字体、 大小和样式特性的格式。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to construct fonts, see [How to: Construct Font Families and Fonts](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何构造字体的详细信息，请参阅[如何︰ 构造字体系列和字体](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Windows Forms applications support TrueType fonts and have limited support for OpenType fonts.
trans-unit.target: Windows 窗体应用程序支持 TrueType 字体，并且具有受限制的 OpenType 字体支持。

trans-unit.source: If you attempt to use a font that is not supported, or the font is not installed on the machine that is running the application, the Microsoft Sans Serif font will be substituted.
trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试使用不支持的字体或运行应用程序的计算机上没有安装的字体，则将替换 Microsoft Sans Serif 字体。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> that uses the specified existing <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> and <xref href="System.Drawing.FontStyle"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 初始化新<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref> ，它使用指定的现有<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>和<xref href="System.Drawing.FontStyle"></xref>枚举。

trans-unit.source: For localized applications that are based on the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] and earlier releases, specifying a font for `prototype` when that font has not been installed on the computer that is used to build your application will cause the Microsoft Sans Serif font to be used instead.
trans-unit.target: 本地化应用程序基于[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/add/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]和早期版本中，指定的字体`prototype`时该字体尚未安装用于生成应用程序的计算机上将导致改为使用的 Microsoft Sans Serif 字体。

trans-unit.source: If your application depends on this behavior and you must recompile your application for the .NET Framework 3.0, you should specify the Microsoft Sans Serif font for `prototype`.
trans-unit.target: 如果你的应用程序依赖于此行为，并且您必须重新编译你的应用程序的.NET Framework 3.0，你应指定的 Microsoft Sans Serif 字体`prototype`。

trans-unit.source: The existing <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> from which to create the new <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 现有<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>从中创建新<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.FontStyle"></xref> to apply to the new <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.FontStyle"> </xref>将应用于新<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Multiple values of the <xref href="System.Drawing.FontStyle"></xref> enumeration can be combined with the <xref uid="langword_csharp_OR" name="OR" href=""></xref> operator.
trans-unit.target: 多个值<xref href="System.Drawing.FontStyle"></xref>枚举可以与组合<xref uid="langword_csharp_OR" name="OR" href=""></xref>运算符。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> using a specified size.
trans-unit.target: 初始化新<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>使用指定的大小。

trans-unit.source: The resulting font has its <xref:System.Drawing.Font.Style%2A> property set to <xref:System.Drawing.FontStyle> and its <xref:System.Drawing.Font.Unit%2A> property set to <xref:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit>.
trans-unit.target: 生成字体都有其<xref:System.Drawing.Font.Style%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Drawing.FontStyle>，其<xref:System.Drawing.Font.Unit%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit>。</xref:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit> </xref:System.Drawing.Font.Unit%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.FontStyle> </xref:System.Drawing.Font.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> of the new <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> of the new <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The em-size, in points, of the new font.
trans-unit.target: 全身大小，以磅为单位，新字体。

trans-unit.source: emSize is less than or equal to 0, evaluates to infinity, or is not a valid number.
trans-unit.target: emSize小于或等于 0，计算结果为无穷大，或者不是有效的数字。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> using a specified size.
trans-unit.target: 初始化新<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>使用指定的大小。

trans-unit.source: The resulting font has its <xref:System.Drawing.Font.Style%2A> property set to <xref:System.Drawing.FontStyle?displayProperty=fullName> and its <xref:System.Drawing.Font.Unit%2A> property set to <xref:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 生成字体都有其<xref:System.Drawing.Font.Style%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Drawing.FontStyle?displayProperty=fullName>，其<xref:System.Drawing.Font.Unit%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Font.Unit%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.FontStyle?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Drawing.Font.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: Windows Forms applications support TrueType fonts and have limited support for OpenType fonts.
trans-unit.target: Windows 窗体应用程序支持 TrueType 字体，并且具有受限制的 OpenType 字体支持。

trans-unit.source: If the `familyName` parameter specifies a font that is not installed on the machine running the application or is not supported, Microsoft Sans Serif will be substituted.
trans-unit.target: 如果`familyName`参数指定的字体运行应用程序的计算机上未安装或不受支持，宋体将被替换。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of the <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> for the new <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 字符串表示形式<xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref>新<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The em-size, in points, of the new font.
trans-unit.target: 全身大小，以磅为单位，新字体。

trans-unit.source: emSize is less than or equal to 0, evaluates to infinity or is not a valid number.
trans-unit.target: emSize小于或等于 0，计算结果为无限大或者不是有效的数字。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> using a specified size and style.
trans-unit.target: 初始化新<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>使用指定的大小和样式。

trans-unit.source: The resulting font has its <xref:System.Drawing.Font.Unit%2A> property set to <xref:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit>.
trans-unit.target: 生成字体都有其<xref:System.Drawing.Font.Unit%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit>。</xref:System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit> </xref:System.Drawing.Font.Unit%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> of the new <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> of the new <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: The em-size, in points, of the new font.
trans-unit.target: 全身大小，以磅为单位，新字体。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.FontStyle"></xref> of the new font.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.FontStyle"> </xref>新字体。

trans-unit.source: emSize is less than or equal to 0, evaluates to infinity, or is not a valid number.
trans-unit.target: emSize小于或等于 0，计算结果为无穷大，或者不是有效的数字。

trans-unit.target: familyis .

trans-unit.source: The `gdiCharSet` parameter takes a value from the list defined in the Windows SDK header file WinGDI.h.
trans-unit.target: `gdiCharSet`参数采用 Windows SDK 头文件 WinGDI.h 中定义列表中的值。

trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Byte>，它指定[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]字符集要用于此字体。</xref:System.Byte>

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value indicating whether the new <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> is derived from a [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] vertical font.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，该值指示是否新<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>派生自[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]垂直字体。

trans-unit.source: emSize is less than or equal to 0, evaluates to infinity, or is not a valid number.
trans-unit.target: emSize小于或等于 0，计算结果为无穷大，或者不是有效的数字。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> is bold.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否这<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>为粗体。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> is bold; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>粗体; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates an exact copy of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 创建此的精确副本<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> this method creates, cast as an <xref:System.Object>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>此方法创建的、 强制转换为<xref:System.Object>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by this <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 释放所有资源由此<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Calling Dispose allows the resources used by this <xref:System.Drawing.Font> to be reallocated for other purposes.
trans-unit.target: 调用 Dispose 允许使用的资源<xref:System.Drawing.Font>可以重新分配用于其他目的。</xref:System.Drawing.Font>

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.Drawing.Font>.
trans-unit.target: 在完成使用<xref:System.Drawing.Font>.</xref:System.Drawing.Font>时调用的 Dispose

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.Drawing.Font> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Dispose 方法离开<xref:System.Drawing.Font>中不可用状态。</xref:System.Drawing.Font>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.Drawing.Font> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.Drawing.Font> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: 调用 Dispose 后，必须释放对所有引用<xref:System.Drawing.Font>以便垃圾回收器才能回收的内存，<xref:System.Drawing.Font>占用。</xref:System.Drawing.Font> </xref:System.Drawing.Font>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)和[实现 Dispose 方法](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.Drawing.Font>.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 始终调用释放在发布到<xref:System.Drawing.Font>。</xref:System.Drawing.Font>最后一个引用之前

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.Drawing.Font> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它所使用的资源之前，不会释放垃圾回收器调用<xref:System.Drawing.Font>对象的`Finalize`方法。</xref:System.Drawing.Font>

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified object is a <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> and has the same <xref:System.Drawing.Font.FontFamily*>, <xref:System.Drawing.Font.GdiVerticalFont*>, <xref:System.Drawing.Font.GdiCharSet*>, <xref:System.Drawing.Font.Style*>, <xref:System.Drawing.Font.Size*>, and <xref:System.Drawing.Font.Unit*> property values as this <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 指示指定的对象是否为<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>且具有相同<> *1>， <> </> *1>， <> </> *1>， <> </> *1>， <> </> *1>，和<> *1> 属性值与此<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>。

trans-unit.target: 要测试的对象。

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: 允许该对象尝试释放资源并在被垃圾回收回收之前执行其他清理操作。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取<xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref>与此关联<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Drawing.FontFamily> represents a group of fonts that have a similar font face, but may have different sizes and styles (for example, Arial, Times New Roman, and Verdana).
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Drawing.FontFamily>表示一组类似的字体，但可能有不同的大小和样式 （例如，Arial，Times New Roman，和 Verdana） 的字体。</xref:System.Drawing.FontFamily>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"></xref> associated with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.FontFamily"> </xref>与此关联<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> from the specified Windows handle to a device context.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>从设备上下文的指定 Windows 句柄。

trans-unit.source: For this method to work, the `hdc` parameter must contain a handle to a device context in which a font is selected.
trans-unit.target: 若要此方法`hdc`参数必须包含在其中选择字体的设备上下文的句柄。

trans-unit.source: This method will not work with an `hdc` handle acquired from a [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)] <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object because the `hdc` handle does not have a font selected.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不会使用`hdc`从获取句柄[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdiplus](~/add/includes/ndptecgdiplus-md.md)]<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>对象，因为`hdc`句柄没有选择的字体。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>

trans-unit.source: A handle to a device context.
trans-unit.target: 设备上下文的句柄。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> this method creates.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>此方法创建。

trans-unit.source: The font for the specified device context is not a TrueType font.
trans-unit.target: 指定的设备上下文的字体不 TrueType 字体。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> from the specified Windows handle.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>从指定的 Windows 句柄。

trans-unit.source: A Windows handle to a [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] font.
trans-unit.target: Windows 句柄[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]字体。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> this method creates.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>此方法创建。

trans-unit.source: hfont points to an object that is not a TrueType font.
trans-unit.target: hfont指向一个对象，它不 TrueType 字体。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> from the specified GDI logical font (`LOGFONT`) structure.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>从指定的 GDI 逻辑字体 (`LOGFONT`) 结构。

trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] `LOGFONT`, or logical font, is a structure that contains 14 properties that describe a particular font.
trans-unit.target: A [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] `LOGFONT`，或逻辑字体是包含 14 描述特定字体的属性的结构。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see "The Logical Font" in the Windows Development documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: 详细信息，请参阅"的逻辑字体"在 Windows 开发文档中[http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] <xref uid="langword_csharp_LOGFONT" name="LOGFONT" href=""></xref> structure from which to create the <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>表示[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] <xref uid="langword_csharp_LOGFONT" name="LOGFONT" href=""> </xref>从中创建结构<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> that this method creates.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>此方法创建。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> from the specified GDI logical font (`LOGFONT`) structure.
trans-unit.target: 创建<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>从指定的 GDI 逻辑字体 (`LOGFONT`) 结构。

trans-unit.source: A [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] `LOGFONT`, or logical font, is a structure that contains 14 properties that describe a particular font.
trans-unit.target: A [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] `LOGFONT`，或逻辑字体是包含 14 描述特定字体的属性的结构。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see "The Logical Font" in the Windows Development documentation at [http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library).
trans-unit.target: 详细信息，请参阅"的逻辑字体"在 Windows 开发文档中[http://msdn.microsoft.com/library](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library)。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] <xref uid="langword_csharp_LOGFONT" name="LOGFONT" href=""></xref> structure from which to create the <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>表示[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] <xref uid="langword_csharp_LOGFONT" name="LOGFONT" href=""> </xref>从中创建结构<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: A handle to a device context that contains additional information about the `lf` structure.
trans-unit.target: 包含有关其他信息的设备上下文的句柄`lf`结构。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> that this method creates.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>此方法创建。

trans-unit.source: The font is not a TrueType font.
trans-unit.target: 不，该字体为 TrueType 字体。

trans-unit.source: Gets a byte value that specifies the GDI character set that this <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> uses.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个字节值，指定的 GDI 字符集这<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>使用。

trans-unit.source: This property returns 1, unless a different character set is specified in the <xref:System.Drawing.Font.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Single%2CSystem.Drawing.FontStyle%2CSystem.Drawing.GraphicsUnit%2CSystem.Byte%29> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 此属性将返回 1，除非中指定不同的字符集<xref:System.Drawing.Font.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Single%2CSystem.Drawing.FontStyle%2CSystem.Drawing.GraphicsUnit%2CSystem.Byte%29>构造函数。</xref:System.Drawing.Font.%23ctor%28System.String%2CSystem.Single%2CSystem.Drawing.FontStyle%2CSystem.Drawing.GraphicsUnit%2CSystem.Byte%29>

trans-unit.source: This property takes a value from the list defined in the Windows SDK header file WinGDI.h.
trans-unit.target: 此属性采用 Windows SDK 头文件 WinGDI.h 中定义列表中的值。

trans-unit.source: The character sets and byte values are listed in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 下表中列出的字符集和字节值。

trans-unit.source: |Character set|Value| |-------------------|-----------| |ANSI|0| |DEFAULT|1| |SYMBOL|2| |SHIFTJIS|128| |HANGEUL|129| |HANGUL|129| |GB2312|134| |CHINESEBIG5|136| |OEM|255| |JOHAB|130| |HEBREW|177| |ARABIC|178| |GREEK|161| |TURKISH|162| |VIETNAMESE|163| |THAI|222| |EASTEUROPE|238| |RUSSIAN|204| |MAC|77| |BALTIC|186|
A byte value that specifies the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] character set that this <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> uses.
trans-unit.target: 一个字节值，指定[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]字符集<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>使用。

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 1。

trans-unit.source: Gets a Boolean value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> is derived from a GDI vertical font.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个布尔值，该值指示是否这<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>是否从 GDI 垂直字体派生。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to determine if a font is compatible with native Win32 controls on non-Unicode platforms.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于确定一种字体是否与非 Unicode 平台上的本机 Win32 控件兼容。

trans-unit.source: GdiVerticalFont only returns `true` if this font was created from a classic GDI font definition, like a LOGFONT or HFONT.
trans-unit.target: 仅返回 GdiVerticalFont`true`如果此字体已创建从经典的 GDI 字体定义，如 LOGFONT 或 HFONT。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> is derived from a [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] vertical font; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>派生自[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]垂直字体; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the hash code for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取此哈希代码<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The hash code for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此哈希代码<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns the line spacing, in pixels, of this font.
trans-unit.target: 返回以像素为单位，此字体的行距。

trans-unit.source: The line spacing, in pixels, of this font.
trans-unit.target: 行距，以像素为单位，此字体。

trans-unit.source: Returns the line spacing, in the current unit of a specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref>, of this font.
trans-unit.target: 指定当前的单元中返回的行间距， <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>，此字体。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that holds the vertical resolution, in dots per inch, of the display device as well as settings for page unit and page scale.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>保存的垂直分辨率，以每英寸点数，显示设备以及页面单位和页面比例设置。

trans-unit.source: The line spacing, in pixels, of this font.
trans-unit.target: 行距，以像素为单位，此字体。

trans-unit.source: graphics is .
trans-unit.target: graphicsis .

trans-unit.source: Returns the height, in pixels, of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> when drawn to a device with the specified vertical resolution.
trans-unit.target: 返回的高度，以像素为单位，此<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>绘制到指定的垂直分辨率一台设备时。

trans-unit.source: The vertical resolution, in dots per inch, used to calculate the height of the font.
trans-unit.target: 垂直分辨率，以每英寸点数，用于计算字体高度。

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 高度，以像素为单位，此<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the line spacing of this font.
trans-unit.target: 获取此字体的行距。

trans-unit.source: The line spacing, in pixels, of this font.
trans-unit.target: 行距，以像素为单位，此字体。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the font is a member of <xref href="System.Drawing.SystemFonts"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示此字体是否的成员<xref href="System.Drawing.SystemFonts"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When the user changes the system font, the IsSystemFont property could return `true`, even if the font is not actually a system font.
trans-unit.target: 当用户更改系统字体时，IsSystemFont 属性也可能返回`true`，即使字体不是实际系统字体。

trans-unit.source: To avoid this situation, if you are using system fonts in your application, you should track user preference changes by handling the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.SystemEvents.UserPreferenceChanging> or <xref:Microsoft.Win32.SystemEvents.UserPreferenceChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要避免此情况下，如果你的应用程序中使用了系统字体，应该跟踪用户首选项更改通过处理<xref:Microsoft.Win32.SystemEvents.UserPreferenceChanging>或<xref:Microsoft.Win32.SystemEvents.UserPreferenceChanged>事件。</xref:Microsoft.Win32.SystemEvents.UserPreferenceChanged> </xref:Microsoft.Win32.SystemEvents.UserPreferenceChanging>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the font is a member of <xref href="System.Drawing.SystemFonts"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此字体是的成员<xref href="System.Drawing.SystemFonts"> </xref>; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this font has the italic style applied.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示此字体是否已应用斜体样式。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate this font has the italic style applied; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表明此字体已应用; 斜体样式否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the face name of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取此字体名称<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of the face name of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 字符串表示形式的字体名称<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the font originally specified.
trans-unit.target: 获取最初指定的字体的名称。

trans-unit.source: The actual font name and original font name can be different.
trans-unit.target: 实际的字体名称和原始字体名称可以不同。

trans-unit.source: System requirements may cause the use of a font other than the font originally specified.
trans-unit.target: 系统要求可能会导致以外最初指定的字体的字体使用。

trans-unit.source: The string representing the name of the font originally specified.
trans-unit.target: 表示最初指定的字体的名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the em-size of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> measured in the units specified by the <xref:System.Drawing.Font.Unit*> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取此的全身大小<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>以指定的单位为单位<xref:System.Drawing.Font.Unit*>属性。</xref:System.Drawing.Font.Unit*>

trans-unit.source: The em-size of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此的全身大小<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the em-size, in points, of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取全身大小，以磅为单位，此<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The em-size, in points, of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 全身大小，以磅为单位，此<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> specifies a horizontal line through the font.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否这<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>指定贯穿字体的横线。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> has a horizontal line through it; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>具有一条横线贯穿它; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets style information for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取样式信息这<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.FontStyle"></xref> enumeration that contains style information for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.FontStyle"> </xref>枚举，其中包含此样式信息<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> with the data needed to serialize the target object.
trans-unit.target: 填充<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>序列化目标对象所需的数据。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>要填充数据。

trans-unit.source: The destination (see <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>) for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: 目标 (请参阅<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>) 此序列化。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the system font if the <xref:System.Drawing.Font.IsSystemFont*> property returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取系统字体的名称，如果<xref:System.Drawing.Font.IsSystemFont*>属性返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Drawing.Font.IsSystemFont*>

trans-unit.source: The name returned by the SystemFontName property will be one of the members of the <xref:System.Drawing.SystemFonts>, converted to a string.
trans-unit.target: SystemFontName 属性返回的名称将为其中一个的成员<xref:System.Drawing.SystemFonts>，并且被转换为字符串。</xref:System.Drawing.SystemFonts>

trans-unit.source: The name of the system font, if <xref:System.Drawing.Font.IsSystemFont*> returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>; otherwise, an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 系统字体的名称如果<xref:System.Drawing.Font.IsSystemFont*>返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>; 否则为空字符串 ("")。</xref:System.Drawing.Font.IsSystemFont*>

trans-unit.source: Returns a handle to this <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 此返回的句柄<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When using this method, you must dispose of the resulting `Hfont` using the [!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)] `DeleteObject` method to ensure the resources are released.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法时，您必须释放生成`Hfont`使用[!INCLUDE[ndptecgdi](~/add/includes/ndptecgdi-md.md)]`DeleteObject`方法，以确保资源被释放。

trans-unit.source: A Windows handle to this <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 这的 Windows 句柄<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The operation was unsuccessful.
trans-unit.target: 该操作不成功。

trans-unit.source: Creates a GDI logical font (`LOGFONT`) structure from this <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 GDI 逻辑字体 (`LOGFONT`) 从该结构<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the `logFont` parameter to the results of the font conversion.
trans-unit.target: 此方法会设置`logFont`字体转换的结果的参数。

trans-unit.source: For more information about logical fonts, see [LOGFONT structure](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd145037.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 有关逻辑字体的详细信息，请参阅[LOGFONT 结构](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd145037.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> to represent the <xref uid="langword_csharp_LOGFONT" name="LOGFONT" href=""></xref> structure that this method creates.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>来表示<xref uid="langword_csharp_LOGFONT" name="LOGFONT" href=""></xref>此方法创建的结构。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Creates a GDI logical font (`LOGFONT`) structure from this <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个 GDI 逻辑字体 (`LOGFONT`) 从该结构<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the `logFont` parameter to the results of the font conversion.
trans-unit.target: 此方法会设置`logFont`字体转换的结果的参数。

trans-unit.source: For more information about logical fonts, see [LOGFONT structure](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd145037.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 有关逻辑字体的详细信息，请参阅[LOGFONT 结构](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd145037.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> to represent the <xref uid="langword_csharp_LOGFONT" name="LOGFONT" href=""></xref> structure that this method creates.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>来表示<xref uid="langword_csharp_LOGFONT" name="LOGFONT" href=""></xref>此方法创建的结构。</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> that provides additional information for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_LOGFONT" name="LOGFONT" href=""></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref> ，它提供的其他信息<xref uid="langword_csharp_LOGFONT" name="LOGFONT" href=""></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: graphics is .
trans-unit.target: graphicsis .

trans-unit.source: Returns a human-readable string representation of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回的用户可读的字符串表示形式这<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The returned string has the following format: [Font: Name=*fontName*, Size=*size*, Units=*units*, GDiCharSet=*gdiCharSet*, GdiVerticalFont=*boolean*]
trans-unit.target: 返回的字符串具有以下格式: [字体︰ 名称 =*字体名称*，大小 =*大小*，单位 =*单位*，GDiCharSet =*gdiCharSet*，GdiVerticalFont =*布尔*]

trans-unit.source: A string that represents this <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，表示这<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> is underlined.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否这<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>带下划线。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref> is underlined; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果此<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>带下划线; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the unit of measure for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取此度量值的单位<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit"></xref> that represents the unit of measure for this <xref href="System.Drawing.Font"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.GraphicsUnit"> </xref> ，表示此度量值的单位<xref href="System.Drawing.Font"> </xref>。
